# Search Approvals

# Description

Search for approvals.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Approval document type - Select the document type to filter approvals: Easy form response, Invoice header, Order header change, or Requisition header.
* Status - Select the status of the approval: Approved, Escalated, Pending approval, or Rejected.



* Requester email



* Approvals - Automatically generated output variable.
